messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine an art office with 21 artists. Amy is working with Bob, Cal, Dan, Eva, Fay, and Gus. Ian is working with Joe, Kim, Leo, Max, Ned, and Ola. Sue is working with Tom, Zac, Kai, Liv, Pam, and Gia. Fay is working with Gus, Bob, Cal, Dan, and Eva. Cal is working with Dan, Eva, Gus, and Bob. Kim is working with Dan, Leo, Max, Ned, and Ola. Ned is working with Ola, Joe, Leo, and Max. Pam is working with Gia, Tom, Zac, Kai, and Liv. Eva is working with Gus, Bob and Zac. Leo is working with Max, Ola, and Joe. Max is connected to Ola and Joe. Liv is working with Gia, Tom, Zac, and Kai. Gus is working with Bob, and Dan. Ola is working with Joe. Gia is working Tom, Zac, and Kai. Bob is working with Dan. Joe is working with Kai. Kai is working with Tom. Tom is working with Zac. What is the shortest path from Gus to Liv? Please list the names in order, separated by commas.

I am working on a company model where we have IQ algorithms for each vertical. Starting with Consumer Response, we are repurposing that into OTT data collection. Looking to build out the tech team with Full stack developers, data scientist, data engineers and manual data expert. This is a paid test task to see who is available.

Looking to hire our first in-house employee! We're in a hurry so looking for someone that's already comfortable with advanced HTML/CSS/JS, and is a great start but doesn't need to be a full-stack developer. We have a lot of internal projects that we want to design/develop but our priority is client facing projects. We are basically looking for an advanced JavaScript front-end developer to take care of front-end designs, so you must have experience designing modern CSS/JS websites and also be proficient in React and Typescript. We use Redux, Redux Toolkit, Typescript, Webpack, and some design libraries/tools that we will discuss at the first meeting. We also use Slack to communicate throughout the day. This job is about 5 hours per day, Mon-Fri with a possibility of growth as we scale our company. We are creating an online e-commerce

nstepPath.parsed_response:
